languages.text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their turn, they gain +30% damage for the rest of the combat.

If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

languages.text: 如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时拥有至少8点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，则装备者造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高30%，效果持续至战斗结束为止。
languages.original_text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者在回合开始时拥有至少8点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，则装备者造成的所有伤害提高30%，效果持续至战斗结束为止。

languages.text: Если в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} у персонажа 8 или более {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, то до конца боя он наносит на 30% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

traits.locale_text: Если в начале своего хода у персонажа 8 или более {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, то до конца боя он наносит на 30% больше урона.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が8以上であれば、その戦闘では+30%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

traits.locale_text: ターン開始時、自身の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が8以上であれば、その戦闘中のダメージ+30%

languages.text: Si el portador tiene 8 o más {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, obtiene +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador tiene 8 o más {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} al comienzo de su turno, obtiene +30 % de daño hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Hat der Träger 8 oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}, erhält er +30 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für den Rest des Kampfes.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger 8 oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zu Beginn seines Zuges, erhält er +30 % Schaden für den Rest des Kampfes.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur dispose de plus de 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il bénéficie de +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pour le reste du combat.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur dispose de plus de 8 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} au début de son tour, il bénéficie de +30 % de dégâts pour le reste du combat.
